name: Instant Pot® Chicken and Rice Soup
author: Allrecipes Magazine
summary: Using brown rice and cornstarch thickens this soup and keeps it gluten free. This Allrecipes Magazine recipe is based on Jane Cooks It Up's Instant Pot® Chicken Pot Pie (Crustless and Gluten Free). Garnish with lemon wedges and dill sprigs.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds chicken breast tenderloins, cubed
directions: Stir together broth and brown rice in a multi-functional pressure cooker until rice is moistened
Add chicken, onion, carrot, celery, corn, garlic powder, onion powder, poultry seasoning, thyme, salt, and pepper
Select high pressure and set timer for 18 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Carefully release remaining pressure using the quick-release method
Stir together half-and-half and cornstarch in a small bowl
Add to cooker, along with peas, and stir
Select Saute function; cook, stirring constantly, until thickened and bubbly, 2 to 3 minutes
